description: Imagining the worst possible outcome in a situation, regardless of likelihood.
Seeing things in extremes with no middle ground â€” all good or all bad.
Repetitive focus on distressing thoughts or events without resolution.
Belief that abilities and intelligence can improve through effort and learning.
Persistent doubt of one's accomplishments despite evidence of success.
Focusing on actionable steps rather than dwelling on the problem.
Attributing problems or causes to outside forces rather than oneself.
